html:
not go out with haste/flight. When Israel left Egypt, she did so in haste and in flight (Ex. 12:39; Deut. 16:3). When her people now go forth in the gathering to Zion, leaving Babylon, they will do so in peace and safety, with neither haste nor flight (D&C 133:14-15).

Lord/God of Israel/go before/be your rearward. God will lead those who return to Zion and will also protect them in the rear. The Hebrew makes it clear that Jehovah will lead them and the Father will come behind (58:8; D&C 49:27).
